text: The Miss Perú 1980 pageant was held on June 20, 1980. That year, 16 candidates were competing for the national crown. The chosen winners represented Peru at the Miss Universe 1980http://www.pageantopolis.com/universe-lists-p-to-z.html and Miss World 1980. The rest of the finalists would enter in different pageants.http://www.caretas.com.pe/Main.asp?T=3082&idE;=874&idA;=45849#.VAHAs8VdXSE ==Placements== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size: 95%;" !width="220" style="background-color:#787878;color:#FFFFFF;"|Final Results !width="300" style="background-color:#787878;color:#FFFFFF;"|Contestant |- | Miss Peru Universe 1980 | *22px Huánuco - Lisseth Ramis |- | Miss World Peru 1980 | *22px Cuzco - Roxana Vega |- | Miss Peru Playa 1980 | * 22px Region Lima - Diana Quijano |- | Miss Maja Peru 1980 | * 22px Piura - Cristina Boza Pardo |- | Top 8 | * 22px Amazonas - Jeanette Vergara * 22px Europe Perú - Nancy Brescia Scavia * 22px Tacna - Mónica Moreno Guerra * 22px Apurímac - Sandra Calisto |} ==Special Awards== * Best Regional Costume - Lambayeque - Paulina Muro * Best Hair - Amazonas - Jeanette Vergara * Miss Photogenic - San Martín - Rossana Álvarez Cook * Miss Body - Cuzco - Roxana Vega * Miss Elegance - Region Lima - Diana Quijano . ==Delegates== *Amazonas - Jeanette Vergara *Arequipa - Rosella Concha Fernández *Apurímac - Sandra Calisto *Cuzco - Roxana Vega *Distrito Capital - Alicia Tillit *Europe Perú - Nancy Brescia Scavia *Huánuco - Lisseth Ramis *La Libertad - Patricia Benavides *Lambayeque - Paulina Muro *Loreto - Patricia Pedraz *Piura - Cristina Boza Pardo *Region Lima - Diana Quijano *San Martín - Rossana Álvarez Cook *Tacna - Mónica Moreno Guerra *Ucayali - Milena Aguirre Roca *USA Peru - Carla Barila == References == Category:Miss Peru Category:1980 in Peru Category:1980 beauty pageants
title: Miss Perú 1980
